text: Stuart Heydinger (5 May 1927 â€“ 6 October 2019) was a British photojournalist and portrait photographer. He was chief photographer at The Observer from 1960 to 1966. Heydinger was born in Kingston upon Thames, London. Heydinger died on 6 October 2019 at the age of 92. ==References== ==Other websites== *"The photojournalism of Stuart Heydinger", a gallery of photographs at The Guardian Category:2019 deaths Category:1927 births Category:British photojournalists Category:Writers from London
